scripts.build-dev: npm run build-ts && npm run build-copy-js && npm run build-copy-sounds && npm run build-copy-images && npm run build-copy-html && npm run build-less
scripts.build-release: npm run build-ts && npm run build-js-terser && npm run build-copy-js && npm run build-copy-sounds && npm run build-copy-images && npm run build-copy-html && npm run build-less-compress
scripts.build-copy-all: npm run build-copy-js && npm run build-copy-sounds && npm run build-copy-images && npm run build-copy-html
scripts.build-ts-js: npm run build-ts && npm run build-copy-js
